answers.answer: Anxiety can cause all sorts of symptoms to include lightheadedness, dizziness, etc.  In my experience, we can also focus in on many symptoms and compound the problems and how we perceive them.  Have you dealt with anxiety for a long time?

I've been experiencing chronic lightheadedness with my anxiety for eight months now. It's extremely scary and uncomfortable sometimes. I have visual disorientation, like when I move my head, my vision doesn't follow quite right, like my eyes are half a second behind my head movements. All I can say is to hang in there and try to stay busy. When you're busy, it takes your mind off of the lightheadedness.
